backend

Interface ITariffManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TariffManager

    public interface ITariffManager
    This interface represents tariff manager for computation of both ÄŒD and IDS JMK prices and selecting the best type of these prices.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<Train,Prices> computePrices(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to, java.util.Calendar calendar, int adultsCount, int childrenCount)
      Compute tarif for CD and for IDS JMK for a given path and people.

    • Method Detail

      • computePrices

        java.util.Map<Train,Prices> computePrices(java.lang.String from,
                                        java.lang.String to,
                                        java.util.Calendar calendar,
                                        int adultsCount,
                                        int childrenCount)
        Compute tarif for CD and for IDS JMK for a given path and people.
        Parameters:
        from - starting station of path
        to - ending station of path
        calendar - date and time of the path
        adultsCount - count of adult people
        childrenCount - count of children in the group
        Returns:
        Map - Train contains path information, Prices contains ids and cd price information
